entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 24
entry.content:

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, October 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, October 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month new Photos were uploaded to 15 Pūjas as follows.
(i) 1982-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 1 high resolutions uploaded, link UK 1982.
(ii) 1982-0505 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 4 high resolutions uploaded, link France 1982.
(iii) 1983-0828 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Switzerland 1983.
(iv) 1983-1106 Diwālī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link UK 1983.
(v) 1984-0902 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 20 high resolutions and 43 low resolutions uploaded, link Switzerland 1984.
(vi) 1986-0921 Śhrī Mahālakṣhmī Pūjā: 1 high resolution, 4 medium resolutions and 28 low resolutions uploaded, link Belgium 1986.
(vii) 1988-0710 Śhrī Haṃsa Chakra Swāminī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Germany 1988.
(viii) 1988-0814 Śhrī Fāṭimah Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Switzerland 1988.
(ix) 1989-0520 Śhrī Buddha Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Spain 1988.
(x) 1989-0524 Śhrī Pallas Athena Pūjā: 4 high resolutions uploaded, link Greece 1989.
(xi) 1989-0527 Śhrī Begum Pasha (Devī) Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Turkey 1989.
(xii) 1991-0331 Easter Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Australia 1991.
(xiii) 1991-0406 Bhavasāgara Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Australia 1991.
(xiv) 1991-0414 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 12 high resolutions uploaded, link Australia 1991.
(xv) 1991-1110 Diwālī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1991.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
